text: You receive a message from your future self warning you not to attend tomorrow's meeting—but the message is incomplete.
Your family's enchanted heirloom chooses a new bearer—someone outside your bloodline. Now, you must reclaim your destiny.
Posing as a servant in a royal court, you gather intelligence for a rebel faction—until the crown prince begins to suspect you.
You uncover documents that link your employer to a global cover-up. Before you can act, your digital identity is wiped clean.
You fall for a rival diplomat while negotiating peace between two long-warring nations. One wrong move could destroy everything.
A humanoid AI claims to have developed emotions—and it names you as its best friend.
All emotions are regulated by law. You discover a black market emotion patch and suddenly remember what joy feels like.
You stumble into a forgotten city beneath the desert. Every structure is intact—but there's no sign of life.
You're confused with a famous celebrity while on vacation—and decide to roll with it.
A town disappears from every map overnight. Only you remember it ever existed—and your childhood best friend lived there.
Your reflection starts moving on its own—and it's trying to tell you something urgent.
You inherit your grandmother’s diary, filled with strange rituals and stories—each one mirroring your own life.
You're hired to protect a whistleblower, but they refuse to tell you who they are exposing—or why you were chosen.
Every full moon, a different magical door appears in your hallway. Tonight, it leads to a city made entirely of music.
A new phone app offers perfect daily advice—but it also knows things you've never said aloud.
You run into your high school sweetheart at a remote train station in another country.
You're forced to spend a weekend with your estranged sibling after a clause in your parents' will demands it.
An ancient relic binds itself to you during a museum trip. Now, you're being hunted—and guided—by spirits of the past.
You begin experiencing two different lives—one while awake, one while asleep—and they start to overlap.
After your grandfather dies, his AI avatar keeps calling you—and it's learning new things he never told it.
